api_list.name: Test API
api_list.description: This API is to test if server is up and running
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://truecaller4.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "truecaller4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Details

api_list.name: Get Country Codes
api_list.description: This will return list of all country codes.

api_list.name: Get Bulk Details
api_list.description: This end point will display the search details for the bulk number's you are looking for.

required_parameters.name: phoneNumbers
required_parameters.description:
Comma separated number (Without Country Code)
Example:- 9768XXXXXX,1400XXXXXX,1400XXXXXX
